snippet.title: SPACE HARRIER (ATARI ST)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Space Harrier (un-emulated) for the Atari ST, a true classic from the golden era of Atari ST gaming which should not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1986

Another great Elite conversion, this time It's Space Harrier for the Atari st.
I remember playing this for the first time on my (at the time) brand new Atari st after upgrading from my 8-bit computers and being totally blown away with the colours, the scrolling, the sound fx, music and playability,...until the Amiga version came along that is which improved the conversion even more, sadly the frame rate is a little slow but it still plays well.
I really enjoyed this version even to this day, well worth adding to your collection.

I hope all you Atari ST fans enjoy this upload.

A huge thanks goes out to the following two guys for supplying me the game for my Atari ST:
James: http://www.retrorabble.com (Retro Game Site).
Fred (Zorro 2) from Atari-Forum.com.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/v...), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Atari ST and it's cool games alive!!!
